meaningMnemonic: The <radical>mountain</radical> on top of the <radical>cliff</radical> is <radical>dry</radical> from the <kanji>coast</kanji> below. Just from looking at the raging <kanji>shore</kanji> below, you'd think everything would be wet, it's splashing everywhere!
readingMnemonic: Sitting up there, watching the <kanji>coast</kanji> with you, is <reading>Gan</reading>dhi (がん). The world famous Gandhi, is just hanging out up here with you, looking down at what you now realize must be a coast in India.
